attachments.title: Roomba's Next Big Step Is Selling Maps of Your Home to the Highest Bidder
attachments.text: The Roomba is generally regarded as a cute little robot friend that no one but dogs would consider to be a potential menace. But for the last couple of years, the robovacs have been quietly mapping homes to maximize efficiency. Now, the deviceâ€™s makers plan to sell that data to smart home device manufacturers, turning the friendly robot into a creeping, creepy little spy.
attachments.fallback: Gizmodo: Roomba's Next Big Step Is Selling Maps of Your Home to the Highest Bidder
